name: Medicare Savings Programs (MSP)
description: Get help paying Medicare insurance, like deductibles, coinsurance, and copayments.
fullDescription: Get help paying Medicare insurance, like deductibles, coinsurance, and copayments.
whatTheyOffer: Administers Medicare, Medicaid, and the Health Insurance Exchanges.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
-  The applicant is at least 65 years
- The applicant has a disability or impairment
- The applicant has limited income and resources

Visit the official website or call for more information.
